name: Iron Ore
description: A basic resource used for building and crafting.

name: Copper Ore
description: Used for electrical components and alloys.

name: Lead Ore
description: Used for radiation shielding and ammunition.

name: Titanium Ore
description: A top-tier resource for advanced armor and spacecraft.

name: Chromium Ore
description: Used for high-strength alloys and energy weapons.

name: Silicon Ore
description: Used for microelectronics and solar panels.

name: Coal
description: Used for generating power and fuel.

name: Sand
description: Used for making glass and concrete.
